summary:
This adds Randgrid, a Nordic warrior to the Temple of Talos in Windhelm. She comes equipped with her own unique set
of Stahlrim armor, a shield (based off the targe of the blooded) and a unique Nordic Sword.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Randgrid Nordic Follower[/size][/color][/font]


[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]This adds Randgrid, a Nordic warrior to the Temple of Talos in Windhelm. She comes equipped with her own unique set of Stahlrim armor, a shield (based off the targe of the blooded) and a unique Nordic Sword.
[i]
[/i][/size][/color][/font][size=4][i]1.2 UPDATE Randgrid is now completely standalone (asides from the requisite DLC), and her files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested![/i][/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Housecarl for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Steward for Hearthfires[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps) [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][color=#ffffff]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. 

[/color][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Mod Details:[/size][/color][/font]
[size=4]I am using [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812/?tab=files]Better Females[/url][size=4] by Bella, and [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70]Nude Females[/url][size=4] by Thepal, pretty simple. If you want Randgrid to look exactly like how she does in the screenshots, otherwise just use whatever you like. I am also using [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457]Facelight[/url] (by tktk1) for the screenshots.[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits [/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big thanks goes to 

[/size][/color][/font][list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]Kalilies[/url]﻿ & Stealthic for KS Hairdo's Renewal [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for The Eyes of Beauty [/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang

files.name: Randgrid Nordic Follower
files.changelogHtml:
Adjusted Randgrid's skin tone
Fixed some issues with tintmasks & warpaint not showing up
Made whole mod standalone
Compiled entirety of files into .bsa
